body.p: TEI Rails is stored in a Git repository. The repository can be browsed over the web at http://git.hcoop.net/?p=leitgebj/tei-rails.git;a=summary .

Downloading the TEI Rails project is simple, but at the moment no packaged distributions are available (this may change in the future). For now, follow the readily-available instructions that you'll find on Google for installing a Git client on your platform of choice.
